subject: Shipping email not received
description_text:
Hello I ordered my simsonn VAM haptics last Wednesday and the website said
there would be a shipping confirmation email a couple days after the
purchase but it has been 6 days and I have not received that email. I just
wanted to make sure that my order went through correctly. Thank you!

Order Number #SSN2813

conversations.body_text: Hi Ron,    We apologize for the delayed response; we've just returned from our 8-day holiday. Your order has been shipped, and here is your tracking link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=JSEJV0933025422YQ
